body: Nagashiro rouge fans, Nagashiro is going back at the yuri genre due to lack of $$(sells) turns out doing non yuri genre will cost her more than earning hence you might see it on anthologies. It’s not a backlash, but business in general. Inb4, I’m a yuri fanatic. No, I’m not, Nagashiro worked non yuri in the past, you can actually look it up in this website. She actually made an illustration of the new yuri she is making: a continuation of the loli twins and blonde MC,  and a new High school setting (sadly, the ntr won’t get anymore continuation).
he fucked the shit out of her
